article.author: Apple Vacations®
article.title: Set Yourself Apart in Los Cabos
article.lead: Los Cabos is the ideal place to set yourself apart from the rest of the world. Cabo San Lucas, San José del Cabo and the corridor in between let you experience a striking landscape where desert meets the sea, a vibrant culture and hospitality that puts you at the center of every experience. See the wonders of Los Cabos with this virtual vacation.

article.author: Oceania Cruises®
article.title: Introducing Oceania Cruises Vista
article.lead: Introducing Vista, your world from a new perspective. Named to reflect their view to the future, Oceania Cruises’ newest masterpiece and the seventh ship in their luxurious fleet will exemplify all the hallmarks of the Oceania Cruises experience that you have come to cherish and also will feature new and exciting elements they’ll reveal in the months to come.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4054w8EKwWc?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Princess®
article.title:
Princess® MedallionClass™
simplified, personalized vacations
article.lead: A Princess<sup>®</sup> MedallionClass<sup>TM</sup> vacation takes service to the next level. You’ll enjoy faster boarding, doors that unlock as you approach and the ability to order whatever you need, delivered to you. Get the most out of your vacation through a variety of digital experiences that personalize your cruise.

article.author: AMResorts
article.title: AMResorts CleanComplete+
article.lead: AMResorts properties, including Secrets & Dreams Playa Mujeres, have implemented a Clean Complete Verification program for new health and safety policies and protocols that begin the moment you start planning a vacation to the time you return home.
article.body:
Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort is perfectly situated in the exclusive gated community of Playa Mujeres within a world-famous 18-hole signature Greg Norman golf course. This stunning AAA Four Diamond Resort, all-suite resort boasts 424 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites, surrounded by secluded white sand beaches and the turquoise Caribbean Sea.
 
Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort boasts 502 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites; three levels of swimming pools spanning over 65,000 square feet, including two infinity pools with breathtaking ocean views, six whirlpools, a children’s pool, a water park for little ones, a waterpark for all ages and a lazy river. With all of this, plus endless daytime activities, live nightly entertainment, Explorer’s Club for Kids, Core Zone Teen Club, welcoming services, romantic inclusions and more, Dreams Playa Mujeres provides a lovely setting for a wedding, honeymoon, romantic getaway or family vacation.
